alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 1:37PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lafayette County through 215 PM CDT... At 137 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Scales Mound to Schapville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Darlington, Shullsburg, Argyle, Blanchardville, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Lamont, Gratiot, Yellowstone Lake St Park and Woodford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
